1: ¡Chyo'k u k'ij ri Ajawaxel! ¡Sibalaj utz qui bixoxic bix che ri ka Dios! ¡Che ri are' rajawaxic queya' qui'laj tak bix!
2: Ri Ajawaxel cuban u banic ri Jerusalen, quebumulij conojel ri aj israelib ri e jubuninak.
3: Ri are' quebucunaj ri pak'pobinak canima', quebubotz' c'u ri qui socotajic.
4: Ri are' reta'm ri cajilabal ri ch'imil, chquijujunal c'ut xucoj ri qui bi'.
5: Nim u banic ri ka Dios xukuje' nim ri u cuinem; ri retamanic man c'o ta u q'uistajic.
6: Ri Ajawaxel cuya' qui k'ij ri e mach'amoj, quebuxucule'j c'ut ri e banal tak etzelal cho ri ulew.
7: Chixbixon che ri Ajawaxel ruc' maltioxinic; chibixoj bix che ri ka Dios, ruc' rok'ibal arp.
8: Ri are' cuch'uk ri caj ruc' ri sutz', cucolomaj ri jäb che ri ulew, quebuq'uiyisaj ri k'ayes pa tak ri juyub,
9: quebutzuk ri awaj xukuje' ri alaj tak cal ri joj aretak quebok'ic.
10: Man are ta ri u chuk'ab ri quiej mawi ri e u ch'ec ri winak ri sibalaj quekaj ta chuwäch ri Ajawaxel;
11: are nim queril wi ri queyo'w u k'ij; ri caquijiquiba' qui c'u'x chrij ri u lok'ok'ebal u c'u'x.
12: Jerusalen, chak'ijilaj ri Ajawaxel; Sion, chaya' u k'ij ri a Dios.
13: Xebucowirisaj c'u ri e u laweyil tak ri awoquibal, xebutewichi'j c'ut ri e a c'ojol chupam ri tinimit.
14: Ri are' cuc'am ulok ri jamaril chupam ri awulew, xukuje' catutzuk ruc' ri trico ri sibalaj utz na.
15: Ri are' cutak ulok ri u tzij cho ri uwächulew, ruc' c'u aninakil cäjubun ronojel ri u tzij.
16: Cuq'uiyisaj ri tew jacha' ta ne rismal chij, ri cujabuj ri sakalaj tew ri jacha' ta ne puc'uc' ulew.
17: Ri cutak ulok ri sakbach ri u tewerisam; ruc' ri tew ri cutak ulok, ¿jachin ta ri cacuinic cataq'ui ta canok?
18: Cutak c'u ulok ri u tzij cujarisaj c'ut; cubano chi cajich'ich' ri quiakik' cäbin c'u ri ja'.
19: Ri are' xuya' retamaxic che ri Jacob, che ri Israel, ri u tzij, ri e u pixab xukuje' ri e u colomibal.
20: Man junam ta xuban cuc' jule' nimak tak tinimit chic ri mawi jubik' xquetamaj ri e u colomibal. ¡Chyo'k u k'ij ri Ajawaxel!
